serverInfo.name: Meta-RAG
serverInfo.title: Meta Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)
serverInfo.description: Meta-RAG brings different retrieval options together in one place. It can search vector indexes, file libraries, and knowledge graphs at the same time. The AI then combines the results into a single response. Users do not need to choose a method. Meta-RAG selects and mixes the most useful information for each question.
